description: Upgrade plan to migrate project to latest LTS versions

tasks.description: Upgrade to Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4
tasks.requirements: Upgrade JDK to 21, Spring Boot to 3.4, Spring Framework to 6.x, and migrate javax.* to jakarta.* if needed. Update all related dependencies to versions compatible with Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4.
tasks.summary: Successfully upgraded Java from 1.8 to 21 and Spring Boot from 2.7.18 to 3.4.0. Migrated javax.* packages to jakarta.* for Jakarta EE compliance. Updated Dockerfile and dependencies for Java 21 compatibility.
